data.text:
The exhilaration I felt at that time, remained in my heart, 
that's why I run. For my own self-satisfaction.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
󠁿The exhilaration I felt at that time, remained in my heart, 
󠁿that's why I run. For my own self-satisfaction.

data.text:
The dream I decided on for myself — those feelings 
kept building up. Since I decided that I would win 
for sure, I was able to keep working hard.
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
󠁿The dream I decided on for myself — those feelings 
󠁿kept building up. Since I decided that I would win 
󠁿for sure, I was able to keep working hard.

data.text: What does it mean, to run for your own sake…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿What does it mean, to run for your own sake…?

data.text:
Huuuuh? To be able to see Spe-chan 
dawdling around here, how rare～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Huuuuh? To be able to see Spe-chan 
󠁿dawdling around here, how rare～.

data.text: Sei-chan…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Sei-chan…?

data.text: Aw man～, they just won't bite today～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Aw man～, they just won't bite today～.

data.text:
Well, fishing is a battle of patience anyways, 
so I can't just go and lose heart here～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Well, fishing is a battle of patience anyways, 
󠁿so I can't just go and lose heart here～

data.text:
…You see, I want to race in a way that 
makes everyone reel in shock～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿…You see, I want to race in a way that 
󠁿makes everyone reel in shock～

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Eh…?

data.text:
After all, in the begining it's not like anyone had any 
expectations of me. When I was little, my results, well they 
were about what you'd expect.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿After all, in the begining it's not like anyone had any 
󠁿expectations of me. When I was little, my results, well they 
󠁿were about what you'd expect.

data.text: But, even so you'd definitely still be running to win.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿But, even so you'd definitely still be running to win.

data.text:
That's why, I was alwaaays thinking about how I could win you 
see, and then one day in a huge upset, I won.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I was alwaaays thinking about how I could win you 
󠁿see, and then one day in a huge upset, I won.

data.text:
So I went in with a plan, they all fell for it, and in a shocker, 
Sei-chan won! The girl who was the favorite, and everyone else 
there, all of their jaws hit the floor!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿So I went in with a plan, they all fell for it, and in a shocker, 
󠁿Sei-chan won! The girl who was the favorite, and everyone else 
󠁿there, all of their jaws hit the floor!

data.text:
Oh man～, that felt sooo good～. Even I didn't think that I'd ever 
be that excited because of a race.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Oh man～, that felt sooo good～. Even I didn't think that I'd ever 
󠁿be that excited because of a race.

data.text:
…But well, you could call that a formative experience, I 
guess? I want to run and surprise everyone, that's the number 
one reason that I run.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿…But well, you could call that a formative experience, I 
󠁿guess? I want to run and surprise everyone, that's the number 
󠁿one reason that I run.

data.text:
That's why, when it comes to winning, I'll use every 
possible thing I have to win. No matter what I have to do…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, when it comes to winning, I'll use every 
󠁿possible thing I have to win. No matter what I have to do…

data.text: …Sei-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿…Sei-chan.

data.text:
Spe-chan definitely had an experience like that, 
right? Something that moved you to your core, 
some kind of experience like that.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Spe-chan definitely had an experience like that, 
󠁿right? Something that moved you to your core, 
󠁿some kind of experience like that.

data.text: Moved me…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Moved me…

data.text:
And! And! That running from before, 
it was reeeeaaally pretty!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿And! And! That running from before, 
󠁿it was reeeeaaally pretty!

data.text:
Watching Suzuka-san joyfully running, 
gave me the courage to chase after my dreams!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Watching Suzuka-san joyfully running, 
󠁿gave me the courage to chase after my dreams!

data.text: I…
data.name: Special Week

data.text: I… I want to run like Suzuka-san, that's what I felt.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿I… I want to run like Suzuka-san, that's what I felt.

data.text:
When I came here, the first time I saw an Uma Musume 
running in front of me, she was really fast, and really pretty.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿When I came here, the first time I saw an Uma Musume 
󠁿running in front of me, she was really fast, and really pretty.

data.text:
I want to become like that… to be able to run like that, 
I look up to her, and chase after her…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿I want to become like that… to be able to run like that, 
󠁿I look up to her, and chase after her…!

data.text: But still, she's still so far away but, someday for sure…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿But still, she's still so far away but, someday for sure…!

data.text:
I see, just like Suzuka-san then. 
That's another huge goal you've got there～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿I see, just like Suzuka-san then. 
󠁿That's another huge goal you've got there～.

data.text:
But, I think that's wonderful, you know? 
That's Spe-chan's reason to run, isn't it?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿But, I think that's wonderful, you know? 
󠁿That's Spe-chan's reason to run, isn't it?

data.text: My reason to run…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿My reason to run…

data.text:
That's right. Right now, 
for me, this is my goal…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿That's right. Right now, 
󠁿for me, this is my goal…!

data.text:
Just so you know, I'll say this too, wanting to fulfill 
the dream you've received from your mothers, that's 
also a wonderful dream, Spe-chan.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Just so you know, I'll say this too, wanting to fulfill 
󠁿the dream you've received from your mothers, that's 
󠁿also a wonderful dream, Spe-chan.

data.text:
And with that, we're in the same boat. The dream entrusted to me 
by Gramps, and my dream of wanting to surprise everyone―
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿And with that, we're in the same boat. The dream entrusted to me 
󠁿by Gramps, and my dream of wanting to surprise everyone―

data.text:
Because I had those two dreams, 
during the [Satsuki Sho] I just couldn't give up, you see～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Because I had those two dreams, 
󠁿during the [Satsuki Sho] I just couldn't give up, you see～.

data.text:
Two dreams― because you were running to fulfill both of them, 
Sei-chan at the [Satsuki Sho] was amazing until the end…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Two dreams― because you were running to fulfill both of them, 
󠁿Sei-chan at the [Satsuki Sho] was amazing until the end…

data.text: That feeling of wanting to win, yours was just that strong.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿That feeling of wanting to win, yours was just that strong.

data.text: But, this time, maybe I'm giving Spe-chan too much help～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿But, this time, maybe I'm giving Spe-chan too much help～.

data.text:
Spe-chan is carrying the same number of dreams as me after all, 
the [Derby] might be a little tough, maybe?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Spe-chan is carrying the same number of dreams as me after all, 
󠁿the [Derby] might be a little tough, maybe?

data.text: Yeah, this time I won't lose to Sei-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, this time I won't lose to Sei-chan.

data.text: After all, my dreams ― I have 3 of them that I want to fulfill.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿After all, my dreams ― I have 3 of them that I want to fulfill.

data.text: Mine, my birth Mom's, and the Mom who raised me!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Mine, my birth Mom's, and the Mom who raised me!

data.text: That's why, I will win the [Derby]…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿That's why, I will win the [Derby]…!

data.text: Oh? You've said it now～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Oh? You've said it now～.

data.text:
In that case, from here on, I won't be helping you! From now on, 
you should get your advice from Trainer-san, besides, it looked 
like he was super worried.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿In that case, from here on, I won't be helping you! From now on, 
󠁿you should get your advice from Trainer-san, besides, it looked 
󠁿like he was super worried.

data.text: …And, we're rivals from now on!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿…And, we're rivals from now on!

data.text: Thank you, Sei-chan…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Thank you, Sei-chan…!

data.text: Trainer-saaaa～nn!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-saaaa～nn!!

data.text: Hold on, hold on! I'm opening it!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: 󠁿Hold on, hold on! I'm opening it!

data.text:
Trainer-san!! Please help me with 
my training for the [Derby]!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san!! Please help me with 
󠁿my training for the [Derby]!

data.text:
This year, this day has finally arrived! 
The all-important [Tokyo Yuushun - The Japan Derby]!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿This year, this day has finally arrived! 
󠁿The all-important [Tokyo Yuushun - The Japan Derby]!

data.text:
From those known as the Golden Generation, 
just which Uma Musume will take hold of the ultimate glory!?
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿From those known as the Golden Generation, 
󠁿just which Uma Musume will take hold of the ultimate glory!?

data.text:
Stay calm, stay calm… be careful at the final corner… 
be mindful of my pace…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Stay calm, stay calm… be careful at the final corner… 
󠁿be mindful of my pace…

data.text:
Yeah, yeah! All that's left is your feelings, your feelings!! 
Just like Derbyyyyyyyy～, that kind of feeling is important!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
󠁿Yeah, yeah! All that's left is your feelings, your feelings!! 
󠁿Just like Derbyyyyyyyy～, that kind of feeling is important!

data.text:
It's pretty obvious but, to be called the Derby Uma Musume, you 
have to win this one chance you have at the [Derby], go hit 'em 
with those strong feelings!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
󠁿It's pretty obvious but, to be called the Derby Uma Musume, you 
󠁿have to win this one chance you have at the [Derby], go hit 'em 
󠁿with those strong feelings!

data.text: Strong feelings…! I got it!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Strong feelings…! I got it!

data.text:
You've been properly working hard this whole 
time. Run with confidence in yourself, and you'll 
definitely win on this grand stage.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿You've been properly working hard this whole 
󠁿time. Run with confidence in yourself, and you'll 
󠁿definitely win on this grand stage.

data.text:
You've been properly working hard this whole 
time. Run with confidence in yourself, and you'll 
definitely win on this grand stage.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
󠁿You've been properly working hard this whole 
󠁿time. Run with confidence in yourself, and you'll 
󠁿definitely win on this grand stage.

data.text:
Um… Trainer-san, and everyone else too, 
thank you very much for helping me out with training!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Um… Trainer-san, and everyone else too, 
󠁿thank you very much for helping me out with training!

data.text:
I've been worried that I've been lacking something 
this whole time but… I've realized that I do 
have a proper dream that I want to fulfill.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿I've been worried that I've been lacking something 
󠁿this whole time but… I've realized that I do 
󠁿have a proper dream that I want to fulfill.

data.text:
The promise with my Moms about becoming "Japan's 
#1"… and for the sake of catching up to the 
one I admire, I'll run with everything I have!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿The promise with my Moms about becoming "Japan's 
󠁿#1"… and for the sake of catching up to the 
󠁿one I admire, I'll run with everything I have!

data.text: Spe-chan's run, we'll be watching closely.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: 󠁿Spe-chan's run, we'll be watching closely.

data.text: Yeah, I'll be off!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, I'll be off!

data.text: Looks like you're all fired up, aren't you, Spe-chan?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿Looks like you're all fired up, aren't you, Spe-chan?

data.text: Yeah, I'm overflowing with the feeling of wanting to win!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah, I'm overflowing with the feeling of wanting to win!

data.text:
The same applies to me… on top of the [Derby] 
being such a grand stage, until now, my desire 
to win has never been stronger.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿The same applies to me… on top of the [Derby] 
󠁿being such a grand stage, until now, my desire 
󠁿to win has never been stronger.

data.text:
Everyone has a dream, huh, I guess it 
makes sense why we're all fired up.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
󠁿Everyone has a dream, huh, I guess it 
󠁿makes sense why we're all fired up.

data.text:
From this point on, we're rivals… 
I'll have you show me everything you've got.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
󠁿From this point on, we're rivals… 
󠁿I'll have you show me everything you've got.

data.text: …In that case, let's all give it everything we've got!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: 󠁿…In that case, let's all give it everything we've got!

data.text: Yeah…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah…!

data.text:
From the Classic grade, 18 Uma Musume are 
settling in to the gates for this grand stage!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿From the Classic grade, 18 Uma Musume are 
󠁿settling in to the gates for this grand stage!

data.text:
2400m ahead, there will be glory for only 1! 
[Tokyo Yuushun - The Japan Derby] ― Starts now!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿2400m ahead, there will be glory for only 1! 
󠁿[Tokyo Yuushun - The Japan Derby] ― Starts now!!
